name: Local Documentation DEMO
description:
Before you lies a test. The Morgan Corporation wishes to learn more about humans. Please answer honestly and truthfully. 

========================================

This game is currently a DEMO! It will soon receive updates, building onto the DEMO. And will eventually release as a full game on Steam and Itch. If you see any bugs, let me know! There's also some easter eggs hidden in the game, and some unused scenes and textures in the game if you want to decompile it. 

Endings:

  • Test Master Ending 
  • Secret Bin Ending (Removed as of now, but still in files.)
